Dana Summitt (Look Appraisal LLC)

★★★★★ 4.6/5 (1 reviews)

About Dana Summitt (Look Appraisal LLC)

Dana Summitt (Look Appraisal LLC) provides professional art appraisal services in Charlotte. With expertise in 20th-century American paintings & photography, Modern prints & rare books, Vintage clothing & music memorabilia, they offer reliable valuations for insurance, estate planning, and donations.

Specialties
